text: (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “oba allah yayi aradhana karanu. nætahot rahman yayi aradhana karanu. (me deken) kumana namakin oba ohuva aradhana kala vuvada, (kam næta. aradhana karanu). ohuta alamkaravat (tavat) bohomayak suddha vu namayan æta. (nabiye!) obage næmadumehi oba itamat sabda nagada samudiranaya nokaranu (mænava!) itamat pahat handinda samudiranaya nokaranu (mænava!) me atara æti mædi margayama anugamanaya karanu (mænava!)”
